=== Star Rating Gravity Forms ===
Tags: Gravity Forms, Gravity Forms rating, Gravity Forms Star
Tested up to: 5.9.2

== Description ==
**Gravity Forms Star Rating** is best field for rating field in gravity forms there is auto generated rating field inw gravity forms [WordPress](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WordPress) site.

**[Demo](https://oceanwebguru.com/themedemo/star-rating-gravity-form/)**
*ðŸ“½ [Documentation](https://oceanwebguru.com/gravity-forms-star-rating-field/)*

> **Plugin Features**
>
> * Easy use
> * Mobile Friendly
> * Multiple Icon in Gravity Forms Star Rating
> * Ratting Title, Max star
> * Ratting step

**[Get Pro](https://oceanwebguru.com/shop/star-rating-gravity-forms-pro/)**

>
> * Unlimted Star Can Use
> * More than one Star Use
> * Customize star hover color
> * Customize star active color
